title: A rational account why some of His Majesties Protestant subjects do not conform to some exuberances in, and ceremonial appurtenances to the Common prayer published for the instruction of the ignorant, satisfaction of all contenders, and the churches union in Gods publick worship.
author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.
notes: "An appendix to the fourth section concerning white, black and other coloured garments" (p. 113-136) includes Johann Wilhelm Stuck's Antiquitatum convivialum. Book 2, cap. 26, De vestitu conviviali.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
